message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I think it's a fair price considering its value, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious offer. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $975000. This is a fair price considering the product's value, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly unique. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $960000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $960000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm counteroffering at $965000. This is a compromise that I think is fair for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a slight adjustment, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $955000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $955000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make another slight adjustment. I'm counteroffering at $962500. This is a compromise that I think is fair for both of us, considering the product's unique value. What do you think?
